channel.title: Indicate what is the Actionhandler/do I need the Actionhandler
channel.description:
Hi, I'm trying to figure out if I already have an actionhandler in my server folder or if I really do need an actionhandler in the first place.
I already searched the server folder using the search bar and could not find the file called Actionhandler.
The closest things I could recognize/find in my server folder are...
WalkToActionHandler
and
Actionsender

item.title: Indicate what is the Actionhandler/do I need the Actionhandler
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The ActionHandler is simply just a class to handle the interactions between the player, and NPCs/Objects.
It’s separate from their packets because sometimes the Server has to wait for the Client (player) to walk to the object before firing the Action.

You do not need a class named “ActionHandler”, but you will need/already have the equivalent.

Read full topic
item.source: Indicate what is the Actionhandler/do I need the Actionhandler

item.title: Indicate what is the Actionhandler/do I need the Actionhandler
item.dc:creator: @Vix Vix
item.description:
@Vix wrote:

WalkToActionHandler is likely the equivalent

Read full topic
